item.title: Why Did a Custody Hearing Raise New Suspicions After Anna Kepner’s Demise?
item.description:
During a December 2025 family custody hearing in Brevard County Florida unrelated to her death, court filings revealed that a 16-year-old stepbrother who shared a stateroom with Kepner on the cruise has been identified in legal documents as a suspect in the death, though no charges or public naming of the minor have been made.
The hearing also focused on parental concerns involving custody of younger children and supervision issues cited by the teen’s biological father, who argued the situation raised questions about safety and oversight after the cruise tragedy.

The hearing also focused on parental concerns involving custody of younger children and supervision issues cited by the teen’s biological father, who argued the situation raised questions about safety and oversight after the cruise tragedy.
